item.title: Kaito announces that its Web3 crowdfunding platform Capital Launchpad is now liveOn July 22, Kaito, an AI-driven Web3 data provider, announced on the X platform that Capital Launchpad is now online and users can register on Yaps. A FAQ page has been added and will be updated based on the feedback and questions received. The financing cycle on Capital Launchpad includes the pre-commitment stage, commitment stage, review stage, optimization stage, and FCFS stage. Currently, the platform only supports USDC on Base, and participants must undergo KYC/AML review, and users in some countries are excluded. Earlier news revealed that Kaito will launch the Web3 crowdfunding platform Capital Launchpad this week. The platform will allow users to participate in private token offerings and new project investments, using an allocation mechanism based on indicators such as social reputation and on-chain holdings to replace the traditional first-come, first-served model. [PANews]

item.title: Coinwatch Launches Track Tool to Help Crypto Projects View Market Maker ActivityCoinwatch has launched Track, a tool to help crypto projects view activity in real-time via market maker API Keys, including buy and sell order depth, spreads, and trading volume, while protecting market maker privacy using a Trusted Execution Environment (TEE). It has currently integrated 12 market makers, including Amber, Ampersan, Auros, CyantArb, Flowdesk, Galaxy, GSR, IMC, Keyrock, LO:TECH, Pulsar, and STS Digital, with more to come. [Foresight News]

item.title: Publicly Listed Capital B Announces Approximately €10.30M Raise to Advance Bitcoin Treasury StrategyAccording to the official announcement, European listed company Capital B (formerly The Blockchain Group) announced an increase of approximately €10.30M to promote its Bitcoin financial company strategy. In addition, this operation may be combined with existing operations, allowing the company to acquire an additional approximately 120 BTC, bringing the company's potential total holdings to 2,075 BTC. [Wu Blockchain]

item.title: Bitcoin miner Mawson has fired its CEO over alleged fraud and misconductAccording to The Miner Mag, Bitcoin mining company Mawson has fired CEO Rahul Mewawalla for breach of fiduciary duty and alleged fraud, and has filed a lawsuit in Delaware court in the United States. Rahul Mewawalla subsequently stated in a letter to the board of directors on July 17 that he "respectfully but vehemently" opposed the company's description of the events, noting that the board had publicly praised his leadership earlier this year. Previously, Mawson was sued by NYDIG's parent company Stone Ridge and its subsidiary Consensus Colocation, accusing it of unauthorized control of $30.00M worth of ASIC miners owned by NYDIG. [Odaily]

item.title: Capital B, a listed company, announced a capital increase of approximately €10.3 million to implement its Bitcoin financial strategyOn July 22, according to an official announcement, European listed company Capital B (formerly The Blockchain Group) announced an increase in capital of approximately 10.3 million euros to implement its Bitcoin financial company strategy. Earlier yesterday, Blockchain Group announced that it had changed its name to Capital B and announced that it was setting up a subsidiary in Abu Dhabi. [PANews]

item.title: Republicans propose 7% leaner SEC budget compared to Biden’s eraHouse Republicans have proposed a plan to trim the SEC’s budget and cut enforcement funding for a Biden-era rule requiring public companies to quickly report cyberattacks.

Orgo is a desktop infrastructure for AI agents. It launches headless cloud virtual machines that AI models can control and interact with. [Techflow]

item.title: Bitget Onchain Trading Lists Grokrooms, ACT B, OPEN, and Other TokensBitget Onchain Trading has launched Solana ecosystem MEME tokens Grokrooms, ACT B, OPEN, and DELULU. Users can start trading in the Onchain Trading section. Bitget Onchain Trading aims to seamlessly connect CEX and DEX, providing users with a more convenient, efficient, and secure on-chain trading experience. Users can directly use their Bitget spot accounts (USDT/USDC) to trade popular on-chain assets. It currently supports popular public chains such as Solana (SOL), BNB Smart Chain (BSC), and Base. [Odaily News]

[Wu Blockchain]

item.title: Institutions: US CPI data's short-term risks still lean upwardAnthony Willis, Senior Economist at Columbia Threadneedle Investments, pointed out that although the U.S. inflation situation is relatively mild, the current level is still significantly higher than the Federal Reserve's 2% target, and short-term risks still tend to be on the upside. He said: "The current data will keep the Federal Reserve in a 'wait-and-see' attitude during the release of the July and August CPI data, until the next interest rate meeting on September 17." By then, the Federal Reserve should be able to more clearly assess the transmission effect of tariffs on inflation and obtain more corroborating data on the weakening labor market. Willis believes that inflation is likely to move towards 3%, but given the dual mandate, the Federal Reserve may still find it necessary to cut interest rates later this year. (Golden Ten) [Odaily]
